",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"renderToStaticMarkup"}]," has limited Suspense support. If a component suspends, ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"renderToStaticMarkup"}]," immediately sends its fallback as HTML."]}],"

",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"renderToStaticMarkup"}]," works in the browser, but using it in the client code is not recommended. If you need to render a component to HTML in the browser, ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/server/renderToString#removing-rendertostring-from-the-client-code","children":"get the HTML by rendering it into a DOM node."}]]}],"

",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Call ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"renderToStaticMarkup"}]," to render your app to an HTML string which you can send with your server response:"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-js","meta":"{5-6}","children":"import { renderToStaticMarkup } from 'react-dom/server';

  response.send(html);
});
"}]}],"

",["$r","Pitfall",null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["This method renders ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"non-interactive HTML that cannot be hydrated."}],"  This is useful if you want to use React as a simple static page generator, or if youâ€™re rendering completely static content like emails."]}],["$r","p",null,{"children":["Interactive apps should use ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/server/renderToString","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"renderToString"}]}]," on the server and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/client/hydrateRoot","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"hydrateRoot"}]}]," on the client."]}]]}]]}]]
